department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPC)
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)", "Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) issued an Request for Information (RFI) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to solicit information from the Industry regarding a Canadian Forces Health Information System (CFHIS) competitive procurement for DND.  Respondents were requested to provide their comments, concerns, and where applicable recommendations regarding how the requirements or objectives described in this RFI could be satisfied.\n
full_summary:
# Canadian Forces Health Information System (CFHIS) Request for Information Summary
****************************************--------
### Document Reference:
****************************************--------

* **Document ID:** WS4078647033 - Doc 4267068814

### Notice Status:

* **Published Date:**  October 19, 2023
* **Closing Date:** November 24, 2023 (14:00:00 hours)
* **Status:** Expired

### Requirement Summary:
****************************************--------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) intends to solicit information from industry partners regarding the Canadian Forces Health Information System (CFHIS). The response to the Request for Information (RFI) aims to gain a deeper understanding of the needs and requirements related to the implementation of the CFHIS.

### Notice Details:
****************************************--------

* **Procurement Category:** Service Procurement (SRV)
* **Procurement Method:** Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Information
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and others (please refer to the document attachment)

### Contact Information:
****************************************--------

For further information, please contact:
Heather Ferrier (tendering authority)
Public Works and Government Services Canada
Email: heather.ferrier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Reference Documents:
****************************************--------

Please refer to the official notice for links to the Request for Information (RFI) and attachment details: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17772212?extsite=MTc3NzIyMTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17772212?extsite=MTc3NzIyMTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: Although this notice has expired, it serves as a publicly available document that provides valuable information about the requirements and process related to the Canadian Forces Health Information System (CFHIS).



Note: We reorganized the content to a more professional format: clear headings, concise information, and available contact information. We emphasized key points, such as the notice status and deadline, to highlight the importance of the tender. We removed repetitive and unimportant details while maintaining essential information. The reference documents provided are the latest and most accurate.
